Text: The Greatest Event in Television History is a mockumentary television series created by Adam Scott and Naomi Sablan.

1: The Greatest Event in Television History

--------------------
Text: The Greatest Event in Television History:  The series premiered on Cartoon Network's late night programming block Adult Swim on October 12, 2012 and ended on January 23, 2014 with a total of four episodes.

Text: The Greatest Event in Television History:  Each episode originally aired independently as a special presentation, several months apart.
